typical_use_case: Long, medium & short-term energy market simulation and optimization (capacity planning, production cost, scenario analysis).
Integrated system planning (production cost, resource adequacy, power flow modeling) combining multiple legacy tools.
Electric generation & transmission market simulation for planning, forecasting, nodal pricing and congestion analysis.
Comprehensive power system design, simulation, reliability, transient and optimal power flow studies.
Resource adequacy analysis and capacity expansion scenario modeling (reliability + economics).
Production cost modeling for electricity markets with nodal pricing and asset valuation.
Load flow simulation and transmission reliability analysis for power system planning.
Locational market-clearing price forecasting and congestion cost analysis.
